word: What is the matter? They have left their first love. "So then because thou art lukewarm . . . I will spue thee out of My mouth." What does He mean by that? Why, if the people have great light and knowledge and yet they are not striving to give that light and evidence to the world in their works, which are living principles that they shall present to the world, Christ is dishonored, and He becomes so disgusted with them that he will not take their names into His mouth to present them to the Father.
